trans-unit.source: Represents an application that is available for use with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et program som er tilgjengelig for bruk med node-samarbeid infrastrukturen.

trans-unit.source: An application is a set of software or software features available to a peer from an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Et program er et sett med programvaren eller programvarefunksjoner tilgjengelig på en node fra et sluttpunkt.

trans-unit.source: Commonly, this refers to network-enabled software packages such as games or other collaborative applications.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, refererer dette til nettverksaktivert programvarepakkene for eksempel spill eller andre samarbeid programmer.

trans-unit.source: A PeerApplication defines the set of software applications or components available for use with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> network.
trans-unit.target: En PeerApplication definerer settet med programmer eller komponenter som er tilgjengelig for bruk med det <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>nettverk.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>

trans-unit.source: This network enables infrastructure participants to initiate usage of this application.
trans-unit.target: Dette nettverket aktiverer infrastruktur deltakere til å starte bruken av dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: They may initiate a collaboration session using the application identified by this class.
trans-unit.target: De kan starte en økt for samarbeid med programmet ble identifisert av denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: After constructing an instance of this class and setting the appropriate properties, this object may be used in <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer> collaboration sessions.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet etter oppretting av en forekomst av denne klassen, og angi egenskapene riktig, kan brukes i <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer>samarbeid økter.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer>

trans-unit.source: Its use is accomplished by passing it to the peer collaboration <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.RegisterApplication%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.UnregisterApplication%2A> methods, which will enable or disable it.
trans-unit.target: Bruk oppnås ved å sende den til node samarbeid <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.RegisterApplication%2A>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.UnregisterApplication%2A>metoder som vil aktivere eller deaktivere det.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.UnregisterApplication%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.RegisterApplication%2A>

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: Globalt unik <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType>egenskapene for denne forekomsten må angis før programmet kan er registrert.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: After registering an application with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure, the registration information persists in the registry.
trans-unit.target: Informasjon om portregistrering vedvarer etter registreringen en applikasjon med infrastruktur for node-samarbeid i registret.

trans-unit.source: This makes the application available to collaboration applications even after the program which registered the application has exited.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at programmet tilgjengelig for samarbeid programmer selv etter at programmet som registrert programmet ble avsluttet.

trans-unit.source: Changing the properties on an application instance after it has been registered has no effect on the registration.
trans-unit.target: Endre egenskaper for en applikasjon forekomst når den er registrert, har ingen innvirkning på registreringen.

trans-unit.source: To update the registration, the application must be deregistered and then registered again with the new information.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil oppdatere registreringen, må programmet registrerer ikke og registrert på nytt med den nye informasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny standardforekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> type.

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: Globalt unik <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType>egenskapene for denne forekomsten må angis før programmet kan er registrert.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> type with the data required for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> type med dataene som kreves for serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> object with a name fully qualified by the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> object within it.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>objekt med et navn fullstendig <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName>objekt i det.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PeerName> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: Globalt unik <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType>egenskapene for denne forekomsten må angis før programmet kan er registrert.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The serialization destination associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Serialisering målet som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance with the supplied application ID, description, scope, and data elements.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer et nytt <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> forekomst med angitt ID, beskrivelse, omfang og data elementer.

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> properties of this instance must be set before the application can successfully be registered.
trans-unit.target: Globalt unik <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType>egenskapene for denne forekomsten må angis før programmet kan er registrert.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: A user-specified <xref:System.Guid> used to identify the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En brukerdefinert <xref:System.Guid>brukes til å identifisere den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> description of the peer application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>Beskrivelse av node-programmet.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A binary data object to associate with the peer application, such as a small image.
trans-unit.target: En binær dataobjektet som skal knyttes til node-programmet, for eksempel et lite bilde.

trans-unit.source: The local file system path to the peer application.
trans-unit.target: Lokale filsystembanen til node-programmet.

trans-unit.source: Command-line arguments for starting the peer application.
trans-unit.target: Kommandolinjeargumenter for å starte programmet node.

trans-unit.source: The scope in which the application will be registered for peer collaboration.
trans-unit.target: Omfanget programmet skal registreres for node-samarbeid.

trans-unit.source: - Length of the binary data object cannot be less than one or greater than 16k.
trans-unit.target: -Lengden av binære data-objekt kan ikke være mindre enn én eller flere enn 16 kB.

trans-unit.source: - id is set to .
trans-unit.target: - id is set to .

trans-unit.source: This event is raised whenever a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> is added, updated or deleted by a remote peer on a subscribed endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> legges til, oppdatere eller slettet av en ekstern datamaskin på en abonnerer på endepunktet.

trans-unit.source: Use of this event requires a value of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> in the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission> object that was created when the peer collaboration session began.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av denne hendelsen krever en verdi for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>i den <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission>objekt som ble opprettet ved node samarbeidsøkten ble startet.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaborationPermission> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets command-line parameters to use when initiating a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kommandolinjeverktøyet parametere som brukes under start av en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> that represents application-specific command-line parameters to use when initiating the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>som representerer programspesifikk kommandolinjeverktøyet parametere som brukes under initialisering av <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets data associated with the current <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir data som er knyttet til gjeldende <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: This data is free form and is provided by the hosting peer.
trans-unit.target: Disse dataene fritt format og er angitt av verts-node.

trans-unit.source: The maximum amount of data that can be provided is 4,096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Maksimal mengde data som kan angis er 4 096 byte.

trans-unit.source: This data is not part of a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> invitation, but rather allows additional data to be associated with the application on the local peer.
trans-unit.target: Disse dataene er ikke en del av en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>invitasjon, men kan heller flere data som skal knyttes til programmet på den lokale noden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: Array of <xref:System.Byte> data that contain a binary object to associate with the peer application.
trans-unit.target: Matrise med <xref:System.Byte>data som inneholder en binær objektet som knyttes til node-programmet.</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: This is commonly a small image or XML blob.
trans-unit.target: Dette er vanligvis en liten bilde- eller XML-blob.

trans-unit.source: The size of this binary data object is either less than 0 or greater than 4,096 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen på dette objektet i binære data er mindre enn 0 eller større enn 4 096 byte.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Unicode <xref:System.String> that describes the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en Unicode <xref:System.String>som beskriver det <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This data is not part of a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> invitation.
trans-unit.target: Disse dataene er ikke en del av en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>invitasjonen.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>

trans-unit.source: However, it is displayed on the user interface when a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> receives an invitation for the application.
trans-unit.target: Men det vises på brukeren brukergrensesnittet når en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>mottar en invitasjon for applikasjonen.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> value that describes the application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>verdien som beskriver programmet.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, the default value for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis angitt, er standardverdien for denne egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Frigir ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objekt og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligner den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> til den angitte <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: No normalizations are performed on the strings prior to comparison.
trans-unit.target: Ingen normalizations utføres på strenger før sammenligningen.

trans-unit.source: All normalization should have been completed while or before constructing the PeerApplication objects.
trans-unit.target: Alle normalization skal være fullført under eller før konstruere PeerApplication-objekter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> forekomsten å teste likhet.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance provided has matching data, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> forekomsten angitt har samsvarende data, andre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method also returns if other is .
trans-unit.target: This method also returns if other is .

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Compares the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Sammenligner den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> til den angitte <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>å teste likhet.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> is equal to the specified object instance, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> er lik den angitte objektforekomsten, andre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Object>har blitt fjernet.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> objects are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om den angitte <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objekter regnes lik.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Først <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Andre <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> skal sammenlignes.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified objects have the same globally unique application <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id*> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Description*>, else <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> hvis de angitte objektene har samme globalt unik programmet <> </> *> og <> </> *>, andre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer hashkoden for en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code used to compare instances of this type.
trans-unit.target: En 32-biters signert heltall hash-kode som brukes til å sammenligne forekomster av denne typen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> med data som kreves for å serialisere målet <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Målet for denne serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined <xref:System.Guid> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den brukerdefinerte <xref:System.Guid>knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: `Null` items are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `Null`elementer er ikke tillatt.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Guid> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> forekomsten.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, the default value for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis angitt, er standardverdien for denne egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from this class can override this delegate to perform additional tasks when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra denne klassen kan overstyre denne representanten til å utføre andre oppgaver når hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains data to be passed to delegates for the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ApplicationChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objekt som inneholder data som skal sendes til representant for den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.ApplicationChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path that designates where the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> executable file resides on the local file system.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir banen som angir hvor den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> kjørbar fil som finnes i det lokale filsystemet.

trans-unit.source: `Null` or <xref:System.String.Empty> values are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: `Null`eller <xref:System.String.Empty>verdier er ikke tillatt.</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> that represents the file path.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>som representerer filbanen.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Med mindre du eksplisitt angitt, er standardverdien for denne egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scope in which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> is registered for collaboration.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir omfanget som den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> er registrert for samarbeid.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"></xref> object that specifies the scope in which the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> will collaborate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope"></xref>objekt som angir området der den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> vil samarbeide.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapsverdien er angitt, må alle hendelser starter ikke som et resultat av en asynkron operasjon tilknyttede hendelsesbehandlingen kall tilbake til tråden som opprettet bestemte <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>

trans-unit.source: The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: Angi verdien for denne egenskapen er `null`, som angir at alle hendelsesbehandling kalles på en system tråd applikasjonsutvalget tråd.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set to a UI element such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er vanligvis satt til en UI-elementet som en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>forekomsten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: Object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref> interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som implementerer den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"> </xref> grensesnittet og brukes av forekomster av denne typen for hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet synkronisering på tråd som opprettet det..

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Kall objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"></xref> interface and returns the data required to serialize the target <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"> </xref> grensesnittet og returnerer data som kreves for å serialisere målet <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objektet til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Målet for denne serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id*> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Description*> of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som inneholder den <> </> *> og <> </> *> av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: This method inherits the default signature and behavior from <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden arver standardsignatur og virkemåten fra <xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id*> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Description*> of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> instance, separated by a space.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder den <> </> *> og <> </> *> av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> forekomsten, atskilt av et mellomrom.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.
